definition: filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar

sentences.english: Interception of solid content called filter cake or cake.
sentences.chinese: 被截留的固体物称为滤饼或滤渣。

sentences.english: After several times of cleaning by the filter cake, materials are dried and discharged by the screw discharger.
sentences.chinese: 滤饼经多次洗涤并吸干后由螺旋出料器输送出料。

sentences.english: Cake resistance (Rc) contributed to the majority of total filtration resistance among all MF experiments.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的实验中，滤饼是主要的过滤阻力。

sentences.english: Filtration pressure should not be too high because of the high compressibility of the filtering cake.
sentences.chinese: 形成的滤饼具有高可压缩性，因此过滤压力不宜过高。

sentences.english: The thickness formula of forming cake layer per unit time of rotary tangential flow is derived.
sentences.chinese: 推导出旋转切向流单位时间内形成滤饼层的厚度公式。

sentences.english: The wet filter cake was recrystallized from 650ml methanol .
sentences.chinese: 将湿的滤饼用650毫升甲醇进行重结晶。

definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
see 球磨機|球磨机[qiu2 mo2 ji1]
a device for concentrating (a liquid)/a condenser
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
to feed (a machine)/foreign goods (abbr. of 進口資料|进口资料)
